# Good Breeze AI

> AI-powered business operations tools for small and mid-size businesses. Freemium SaaS platform delivering competitive analysis, SEO auditing, and marketing automation reports.

## What We Do

Good Breeze AI helps business owners eliminate busywork and scale output without hiring a team. We provide:

- **Competitive Analyzer** — AI-generated head-to-head, top 3 competitors, and competitive position reports
- **SEO Auditor** — Technical SEO audits, keyword research, landing page optimization, and AI SEO recommendations
- **Done-for-you automation** — Custom n8n workflow implementations for client businesses

## Products

- Free tier: 1 report to try (no credit card required)
- Impulse pack: 3 reports for $1
- Starter subscription: $20/month unlimited access

## Target Audience

Small business owners, marketing consultants, and agency operators who want AI-powered insights without enterprise pricing.

## Company

- Website: https://goodbreeze.ai
- Founded: 2025
- Location: United States
